item.title: Jode add a quote by Mary Anne Radmacher
item.description: "Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I'll try again tomorrow." -- Mary Anne Radmacher

item.title: Jode add a quote by Horace Mann
item.description: "Lost, yesterday, somewhere between sunrise and sunset, two golden hours, each set with sixty diamond minutes. No reward is offered for they are gone forever." -- Horace Mann

item.title: Jode add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I am thankful for laughter, except when milk comes out of my nose." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jode add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing ever happened." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jode add a quote by Eden Phillpotts
item.description: "The universe is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper." -- Eden Phillpotts

item.title: Jode add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Jode add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jode add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Jode add a quote by Paul Tillich
item.description: "The first duty of love is to listen." -- Paul Tillich

item.title: Jode add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright
